name: f i s h e r m a n
name_original: f i s h e r m a n
description:
I created this Fisherman as a part of a "C# basics class" at FAMU, where I had to create a console game. I could use a SFML library... so that's what I did and this is the result.

The game let's you fish some fishees and they will share their opinion with you. 

What you do with them is up to you. Have fun.
